EmailTemplate.textOnly: We both know the modern customer wants eCommerce, but how can you manage your brand experience and deliver high quality orders with a generic, inflexible eCommerce platform? Northgate Markets, who leverage a strong integration between NCR Emerald POS and NCR Freshop, quickly gave their customers a new way to shop, and took advantage of new insights that gave them a deep, connected insights into store and shopper activity.
